property.summaryDescription: Diamond residential is delighted to offer this bright, modern and spacious newly 3 double bedroom property in this period conversion on the famous Abbey Road. The property has high ceilings, wooden floors throughout and has a good standard of decorative finish. The property is on the raised ground floor with use of communal gardens. The property comprises of a good size reception, fully fitted kitchen, modern bathroom, 3 double bedrooms with plenty of built in storage. Available now furnished or unfurnished. Please get in touch to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this 4 bedroom property which consists of a large reception and dining area, two double bedrooms and 2 single bedrooms with ample storage, a large fully fitted kitchen with excellent quality wooden floors throughout, two bathrooms, 24 hour porterage and private parking. Set within a well sought after, secure and private development within moments from Regents Park and all the amenities and transport links of SJW high Street.

Diamonds residential are delighted to offer this spacious two bedroom flat situated in the heart of Maida Vale. The flat has wooden floors throughout and comprises of a large reception room with plenty of natural light and a feature fire place, fully fitted kitchen, main bedroom with feature fireplace and ample storage, family bathroom, second double bedroom with feature fire place. Please get in touch to arrange a viewing or for more information. Landlord is open to offers.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this stylish 2 double bedroom property which is on the second floor of this well located purpose built block off St. Johns Wood High Street and Regents Park. The property consists of 2 double bedrooms, good size reception, one large bathroom and a modern fully fitted kitchen. The property is available furnished or unfurnished. Available now, Please contact us to arrange a viewing or for more information.

property.useAddress: 83 Abbey Road, St. Johns Wood, LONDON
property.summaryDescription: Diamond Residential are delighted to offer this modern, bright, recently redecorated two double bedroom apartment located on the ground floor of this well maintained private block located on Abbey Road. The property benefits from spacious reception room, modern fully fitted kitchen and storage. The property is well located being within close proximity to both the tube station and local amenities of St John's Wood. Please get intouch to arrange a viewing or for more infomation.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this 3 double bedroom apartment. The property consist of a large and bright reception room with direct access to the garden, 3 good size double bedrooms, a fully fitted modern eat-in kitchen and bathroom all finished to an excellent standard. Available now, located moments from Maida Vale station (Bakerloo Line) please get in contact to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this good size 3 double bedroom apartment situated on the second floor in this well located popular mansion block. The property consists of a large reception room, 3 double bedrooms with ample storage, fully fitted eat- in modern kitchen, modern bathroom and shower. The property is offered furnished or unfurnished. Please get in contact to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this good size 3 double bedroom apartment situated on the second floor in this well located popular mansion block. The property consists of a large reception room, 3 double bedrooms with ample storage, fully fitted eat- in modern kitchen, modern bathroom and shower. Moments from Maida vale and SJW high street and all local amenities with excellent transport links the property is offered furnished or unfurnished. Please get in contact to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this bright 2 double bedroom apartment situated on the raised ground floor of a period conversion located a short walk away from Warwick Avenue Tube. The property benefits from being newly refurbished in a contemporary high spec interior. The property comprises a good size reception, fireplace, modern fully fitted kitchen, and ensuite bathroom and ensuite shower room. Available now furnished or unfurnished. Please get in contact with us to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this 3 good sized bedroom apartment set in a beautiful conversion on Hamilton Terrace. The property consists of a grand reception room with fire place and floor to ceiling sash windows as well as a fully fitted large eat in kitchen, two full bathrooms, plenty of storage and use of shared garden. The property can be furnished or unfurnished. Please get in contact to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this bright, modern and spacious newly 3 double bedroom property in this period conversion on the famous Abbey Road. The property has high ceilings, wooden floors throughout and has a good standard of decorative finish. The property is on the raised ground floor with use of communal gardens. The property comprises of a good size reception, fully fitted kitchen, modern bathroom, three double bedrooms with plenty of built in storage moments from SJW high street and all local amenities with excellent transport links. Available now furnished or unfurnished.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this stunning 5 bedroom family house, located in prime West Hampstead. The property has just been totally refurbished and has wooden floors throughout, feature fireplaces and a modern, neutral decor. The property is arranged over 4 floors and comprises of fully fitted family kitchen with patio doors leading onto private garden, double aspect reception and dining room, 5 good size double bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and private parking. The property is available now furnished or unfurnished. Please get in contact with us to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this extremely spacious 3 double bedroom, 2 bathroom ground floor garden flat spanning over 1500sqft in the heart of the South Hampstead conservation area. The property has just been refurbished throughout to a high standard with wood floors throughout, sole use of very large private garden, plenty of storage including a basement with separate utility area. 3 double bedroom 2 bathrooms, large reception with sliding patio doors leading to garden, spacious kitchen with all mod cons. Available now furnished or unfurnished. Please get in contact to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this 3 double bedroom property on the second floor is this popular portered block is ideally located across the road from Regents Park and with all the amenities of St.Johns Wood High Street. The property is spacious and bright with wooden floors, modern eat in kitchen, double reception/dining room, 3 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms one en-suite. The heating and hot water bills are included. The property is available furnished or unfurnished. Please get in contact with us to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this spacious (over 1500sqft) 3 double bedroom interior designed apartment that has just been refurbished to a excellent standard throughout which consists of large reception room, dining room, separate fully fitted kitchen,3 bathrooms and a private balcony. The property is in a well sought after location which is moments from all the amenities and transport links of St. Johns Wood and Maida Vale. Available furnished or unfurnished. Please get in contact to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this spacious 4 bedroom apartment located on the 4th floor of this period stucco terrace conversion moments away from Little Venice. The apartment has been fully modernised to a high specification benefitting from wooden floors and a large reception room. The property is situated in this quiet and fashionable area of W9, yet also within easy reach of all the local amenities and transport links that Maida Vale and Little Venice and St. Johns wood has to offer. Please get in contact to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this stunning 4 bedroom property which is tastefully decorated throughout. On the first floor of an elegant building with concierge, the property comprises a large reception room with dining area opening onto private balcony, spacious modern kitchen with breakfast area, 2 spacious bedrooms both with fitted wardrobes and en suite bathrooms, further well-proportioned bedroom with en suite shower room, fourth bedroom, bathroom and guest cloakroom. Excellent transport links and location which is moments from all the shops and amenities of Maida Vale(Bakerloo line) and St. John's Wood (Jubilee line). Available furnished or unfurnished. Please get in contact with us to arrange a viewing or for more information.

Diamond residential is delighted to offer this exceptional 5 bedroom house which is arranged over four floors offering spacious, elegant living. The property is tastefully decorated throughout and has its own private front and rear gardens. The property consist of a large double reception/dining room, a further larger than average reception room with storage room and study, contemporary kitchen with French patio windows opening onto bright spacious conservatory with direct access to the well maintained private garden, master bedroom with fitted wardrobes and en suite bathroom, well proportioned second bedroom with en suite bathroom, three further bedrooms, shower room, two guest cloakrooms, utility room, further store rooms. Clifton Hill is outstanding location close to the shops and amenities of St. John's Wood and Maida Vale.
The closest transport links are St. John's Wood Station (Jubilee line), Maida Vale Station (Bakerloo line), Kilburn Park Station (Bakerloo line) and Kilburn High Road Station (National Rail Services).

Please get in contact with us to arrange a viewing or for more infomation.
